channel.title: DSA on Mahi Garg
channel.description: Recent content in DSA on Mahi Garg

item.title: Find K Closest Elements - LeetCode : Swift
item.description:
Find K Closest Elements - LeetCode

Given a sorted integer array arr, two integers k and x, return the k closest integers to x in the array. The result should also be sorted in ascending order.

item.title: Intersection of Two Arrays - LeetCode : Swift
item.description:
Intersection of Two Arrays - LeetCode

Given two integer arrays nums1 and nums2, return an array of their intersection. Each element in the result must be unique and you may return the result in any order.

item.title: Contains Duplicate II - LeetCode : Swift
item.description:
Contains Duplicate II - LeetCode

Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return true if there are two distinct indices i and j in the array such that nums[i] == nums[j] and abs(i - j) <= k.

item.title: Minimum Size Subarray Sum - LeetCode : Swift
item.description:
Minimum Size Subarray Sum - LeetCode

Given an array of positive integers nums and a positive integer target, return the minimal length of a subarray whose sum is greater than or equal to target. If there is no such subarray, return 0 instead.

item.title: Repeated DNA Sequences - LeetCode : Swift
item.description:
Repeated DNA Sequences - LeetCode

The DNA sequence is composed of a series of nucleotides abbreviated as 'A', 'C', 'G', and 'T'.

item.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters - LeetCode : Swift
item.description:
Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters - LeetCode

Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

item.title: Majority Element - LeetCode : Swift
item.description:
Majority Element - LeetCode

Given an array nums of size n, return the majority element.

The majority element is the element that appears more than [n / 2] times. You may assume that the majority element always exists in the array.

item.title: Longest Substring with At Least K Repeating Characters - LeetCode : Swift
item.description:
Longest Substring with At Least K Repeating Characters - LeetCode

Given a string s and an integer k, return the length of the longest substring of s such that the frequency of each character in this substring is greater than or equal to k.
